item.title: Workers Sites configuration
item.description: Workers Sites configurationWorkers Sites require the latest version of Wrangler External link icon Open external link . ​​ Commands wrangler generate proj --site Creates a project with a Worker serving a generic HTML file and favicon with the directory structure: ├── public # files to serve | ├── favicon.ico | └── index.html ├── workers-site | ├── index.js # Workers script that serves the assets | ├── package-lock.json | └── package.
